Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Create 8 core documents - DAO Primitives Framework transformation complete

Created 8 comprehensive documents from scratch:

Reference Documents (2):
- organizational-elements-guide.md - Quick reference for DAOs, Cells, Roles, Tasks
  * Definitions, characteristics, use cases, relationships, design principles
- dao-primitives-catalog.md - Technical tools catalog (20+ tools)
  * Governance, treasury, identity, coordination, token, voting primitives

User Journey Guides (3):
- start-concepts.md - Concept Learners Path (2-3 hour learning journey)
  * 4-stage learning path, element deep dives, dimensional lenses
- start-implementation.md - Practitioners Path (practical roadmap)
  * 4-stage implementation (Assess, Design, Implement, Iterate)
- start-evidence.md - Evidence Path (case studies and patterns)
  * AIFS, RPP case studies, implementation patterns, lessons learned

Articles (1):
- framework-complete.md - Framework release announcement
  * Overview, innovations, structure, getting started

Integration Documents (2):
- sb-services.md - SuperBenefit services and engagement models
  * Consulting, implementation, facilitation, training services
- knowledge-garden.md - Knowledge ecosystem integration
  * Cross-references, related domains, conceptual bridges

Progress tracking updated:
- replacement-map.md - Section 3 complete, all 8 documents documented
- replacement-map.md - Summary shows 35/35 deliverables (100%) complete
- current-phase.md - Transformation complete, optional phases noted
- completed.md - Phase 3 accomplishments and transformation summary
- session-context.md - Complete framework structure and recommendations

TRANSFORMATION COMPLETE: 35/35 deliverables âœ…
- Phase 1: 5 unpublished resources published
- Phase 2: 27 files with updated terminology
- Phase 3: 8 new documents created
- Framework ready for production use

Optional enhancement phases (4-6) available for future work.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 4.1-4.2: Document structure and create new directories (reorganization paused)

- Created structure-before.md with comprehensive documentation
- Documented all 35 files across current directory structure
- Analyzed structure characteristics (strengths and considerations)
- Identified reorganization impact areas
- Documented preservation and rollback procedures

Step 4.2 - Create New Structure (Empty):
- Created 4-section directory hierarchy (numbered 1-4)
  * 1-framework-foundation/ (organizational-elements, dimensional-lenses)
  * 2-implementation/ (mapping, graphing, primitive-selection)
  * 3-evidence/ (case-studies, articles)
  * 4-reference/ (quick-guides, templates, integrations)
- Created structure-after-4.2.md documenting new directories
- All subdirectories empty and ready for file population
- Current structure remains fully functional

Steps 4.3-4.4 NOT executed (per user request):

- Reference path updates - NOT DONE
- Navigation updates - NOT DONE
- Section index creation - NOT DONE

Current State:
- Both structures coexist

- New structure: Empty directories prepared for future use
- No files moved, no references broken

- completed.md - Phase 4.1-4.2 documented, 4.3-4.4 marked as not done

Framework remains production-ready with current structure.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 4: Complete structural reorganization of DAO Primitives Framework

Reorganized all 35 files into 4-section hierarchy with automated link fixes.

Reorganization completed:
- Created 4-section directory structure (1-4 prefixed for sequence)
- Copied all 35 files to new locations via reorganize-copy.sh
- Fixed all internal cross-references via fix-links.sh
- Verified zero broken links via check-links.sh

New structure:
- 1-framework-foundation/ - Core concepts (organizational elements, dimensional lenses)
- 2-implementation/ - Practical guides (mapping, graphing, primitive selection)
- 3-evidence/ - Case studies and articles
- 4-reference/ - Quick guides, templates, integrations

Scripts created:
- reorganize-copy.sh - File copying automation
- fix-links.sh - Path reference updates
- check-links.sh - Link validation

Progress tracking updated:

- completed.md - Phase 4 accomplishments documented

Framework ready for editing and refinement.
